Strong Team, Strong Code About Our Company

Founded in 2024 by 4 Momentum students, we were inspired by the upcoming wedding of one of our teammates. Faced with a limit of 100 guests, but with a preliminary guestlist of 200, Lynerd was faced with a dilemna. How to widdle down his invite his guestlist? That's when Invited was born!
